duties_responsibilities.duty: Set up and operate small to large-scale audiovisual systems in a hospitality environment, ensuring complete customer satisfaction.
Troubleshoot technical issues and resolve problems quickly as they arise.
Provide excellent service and strive to exceed the expectations and needs of internal and external customers.
Maintain a positive relationship with all clients through effective communication.
Understand company processes, follows procedures, and completes systems entry and paperwork accurately.
Work with clients to finalize invoices.
Anticipate equipment challenges and changes in a timely and professional manner.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma required. Associate’s degree preferred. Encore Technical Level 3 Certification required. New Encore team members must be certified by their location within 30 days. 1 - Encore Technical Level Two Core Certification required (Audio, Lighting, Projection, Video, Scenic). New Encore team members must be certified by a qualified proctor within 60 days.
